# init(wrappingLabelWithString:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a text field for use as a multiline static label with selectable text that uses the system default font.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor convenience init(wrappingLabelWithString stringValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **stringValue**: A string to use as the initial content of the editable text field.

## Return Value

A multiline text field that displays the specified string.

## Creating Text Fields

- **init(labelWithAttributedString:)**: Creates a text field for use as a static label that displays styled text, doesn’t wrap, and doesn’t have selectable text.
- **init(labelWithString:)**: Initializes a text field for use as a static label that uses the system default font, doesn’t wrap, and doesn’t have selectable text.
- **init(string:)**: Initializes a single-line editable text field for user input using the system default font and standard visual appearance.
